text: is a Japanese equestrian. He competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics and the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Katori, Chiba Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Tadayoshi Hayashi
